comments:
Stable 20020214, using "new" team support.

My CVS setup is *slightly* strange: I have a pserver connection to localhost 
4201, but that is *actually* (usually) connected to the Apache CVS repository
via an SSH tunnel.

If I don't have the tunnel up and I try to show a file in the resource history, 
I get:

CVS communication error: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect

Which is fine... but on clicking Ok to that error, I get an internal error with 
the following stack trace:
